name: MAJOR LIFE GUARDING
description:
Another lifeguard saving little Jimmy? Not on your watch.

Race through the waves to save the life of poor Jimmy - even if that means dragging him from safety back over to your beach.

Created in 8 hours for Jamuary.

Controls

Player 1: A & D

Player 2: Left and Right

Hammer them in the right order to get to Jimmy first and drag him to safety!

Built by Alex Johansson

Super Catchy Music by Will Bedford
